definitions.definition: the part of the body above the neck where the eyes, nose, mouth, ears, and brain are:
examples: Put this hat on to keep your head warm.

definitions.definition: a person or animal when considered as a unit:
examples: Dinner will cost Â£20 a/per head (= for each person).

definitions.definition: a measure of length or height equal to the size of a head:
examples: Her horse won by a head.

definitions.definition: to go in a particular direction:
examples: I was heading out of the room when she called me back.

definitions.definition: a person with a particular strong interest or addiction:
examples: a crack-head (= someone who depends on the drug crack)
